org.jorlib.demo.frameworks.columnGeneration.branchAndPriceExample.cg

Class ExactPricingProblemSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jorlib.frameworks.columnGeneration.pricing.PricingProblemSolver<TSP,Matching,PricingProblemByColor>
      • org.jorlib.demo.frameworks.columnGeneration.branchAndPriceExample.cg.ExactPricingProblemSolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callable<Void>, BranchingDecisionListener

    public class ExactPricingProblemSolver
extends PricingProblemSolver<TSP,Matching,PricingProblemByColor>
implements BranchingDecisionListener
    Algorthm implementation which solves the pricing problem to optimality. This solver is based on an exact MIP implementation using Cplex.
    Version:
    13-4-2015
    Author:
    Joris Kinable

      • setObjective

        protected void setObjective()
        Update the objective function of the pricing problem with the new pricing information (modified costs). The modified costs are stored in the pricing problem.
